articles.title: Greetings to 19th Congress of Communist Party of China
articles.content:
Greetings to 19th Congress of Communist Party of China 
 Pyongyang, October 18 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea Wednesday sent a congratulatory message to the 19th Congress of the Communist Party of China.
					 The Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea in the message warmly congratulated the 19th Congress of the Communist Party of China and sent warm greetings to all the party members and other Chinese people.
					
					 The Chinese people have made great progress in accomplishing the cause of building socialism with Chinese characteristics under the correct guidance of the Communist Party of China in the past and we are greatly pleased over this, the message said.
					
					 It sincerely wished the 19th Congress of the CPC satisfactory success.

articles.title: Invaders, Provokers Will Meet Most Miserable Death
articles.content:
Invaders, Provokers Will Meet Most Miserable Death
 Pyongyang, October 18 (KCNA) -- The U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces began the largest-ever joint maritime drill in the East Sea and South Sea of Korea on Oct. 16, driving the tension into the worst line of explosion.
					 The nuclear-powered carrier Ronald Reagan strike group, three nuclear submarines such as Michigan, more than 40 warships including Aegis destroyers and fighters are giving off powder smell in those waters.
					
					 The U.S. and the south Korean puppets are mulling keeping the nuclear strategic assets in the waters off south Korea and in its vicinity after the said drill so as to stage another large-scale joint maritime strike drill by additionally introducing the U.S. nuclear carrier Theodore Roosevelt strike group in late October.
					
					 They are planning to conduct NEO drill (non-combatant evacuation operation) for immediate evacuation of American civilians residing in south Korea from Oct. 23, and thus intentionally create the tension on the eve of war.
					
					 A spokesman for the Pan-Korean Emergency Measure Committee for Opposing Nuclear War Drills against the DPRK in a statement Wednesday said this proves that the U.S. and south Korean puppet authorities are attempting to ignite a war on the Korean peninsula at any cost while watching for an opportunity after making its "preemptive attack upon the north" a fait accompli.
					
					 The statement said:
					
					 Now that the enemies claim the drill would be a demonstration of the real strike upon the DPRK, they should know that the Korean-style toughest countermeasures have been fully prepared to make the strike end in smoke at a single stroke.
					
					 Worse still, the U.S. is running amuck by introducing under our nose the targets we have set as primary ones. The U.S. should expect that it would face unimaginable strike at an unimaginable time.
					
					 The south Korean puppets, too, will not go scot-free as they are introducing the U.S. nuclear strategic assets and turning the whole land of south Korea into the worst-ever field of a nuclear war without seeing the imminent catastrophic disaster.
					
					 The grave situation on the Korean peninsula reaching the unpredictable phase more clearly shows that the U.S. and south Korean puppet warmongers are the chieftains threatening the existence and development of the Korean nation and the root cause of a nuclear war.
					
					 All the Koreans in the north, the south and overseas will, with concerted efforts, mercilessly smash the war frenzy of the U.S. and south Korean puppet warmongers to get rid of the abyss of ruin through dangerous war gambling and inflict the most miserable death on the invaders, provokers increasing the danger of a nuclear war.

articles.title: DPRK Delegate Clarifies Stand to Hold Fast to Line of Simultaneously Developing Two Fronts
articles.content:
DPRK Delegate Clarifies Stand to Hold Fast to Line of Simultaneously Developing Two Fronts
 Pyongyang October 18 (KCNA) -- The DPRK's access to nuclear weapons and ICBM was a just measure for self-defence against the evident and practical nuclear threat of the U.S. and it will never flinch even an inch from the road we have chosen upholding the line of simultaneously developing the two fronts, the everlasting banner for safeguarding the peace.
					 The DPRK delegate said this in a speech at the First Committee of the 72nd Session of the UN General Assembly on October 16.
					
					 Even after over 70 years since the UN's foundation peace and stability still remain as its main theme but we are witnessing the building of a world without nuclear weapons not in a close distance but a reality far from it, he said, and continued:
					
					 A nuclear arms race reminiscent of the Cold War era is reviving. The U.S. deploys its strategic assets mounted with nuclear weapons in various regions and poses blatant nuclear threats to sovereign states.
					
					 The U.S. and other nuclear weapons states and NATO, etc. took a negative approach to the NBT adopted at the UN in July last and even boycotted the meeting on the treaty.
					
					 The DPRK consistently supports the total elimination of nuclear weapons and the efforts for denuclearization of the entire world. However as long as the U.S. who constantly threatens and blackmails the DPRK with nuclear weapons rejects the NBT the DPRK is not in a position to accede to the treaty.
					
					 No any other country in the world has been subjected to such an extreme and direct nuclear threat from the U.S. for such a long time and experienced a nuclear war exercise in front of its own gate which is essentially most vicious and brutal, like the DPRK.

articles.title: 3rd Enlarged Meeting of Board of Directors of Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il Foundation
articles.content:
3rd Enlarged Meeting of Board of Directors of Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il Foundation
 Pyongyang, October 18 (KCNA) -- The third enlarged meeting of the Board of Directors of the Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il Foundation took place here on Wednesday.
					 Attending it were Vice-Chairman Keith Bennet and directors of the Board of the Foundation, members of the Foundation, a delegation of the Russian Committee to Praise the Great Persons of Mt Paektu and other foreign guests and overseas Koreans.
					
					 Present as observers were officials of the Secretariat of the Board.
					
					 The meeting discussed the organizational matter of the Board and reviewed its work of one year after the second meeting.
					
					 Then it adopted the amended rules of the Foundation and informed the participants of the orientation of the Board's future activities.
					
					 The meeting adopted a letter to respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Letter to Kim Jong Un from 3rd Enlarged Meeting of Board of Directors of Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il Foundation
articles.content:
Letter to Kim Jong Un from 3rd Enlarged Meeting of Board of Directors of Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il Foundation 
 Pyongyang, October 18 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un Wednesday received a letter from the participants in the 3rd enlarged meeting of the Board of Directors of the Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il Foundation.
					 Noting that the meeting was successfully held in Pyongyang, the letter said that its participants expressed full support for the efforts to further expand the Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il Foundation into a world-wide foundation and vowed to invigorate its work.
					
					 Seeing the realities of the DPRK, they came to know again that no one in the world can match the strength of the Korean people who firmly believe and follow their leader, it said.
					
					 The human history has recorded many politicians and famous persons, but the world does not know such great men as President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il always alive in the hearts of the people, it said.
					
					 In the letter, the participants expressed their will to more widely conduct the work of the foundation and let the world people keep the images of the peerlessly great persons deep in their mind, with the pride of being members of the Board of Directors of the Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il Foundation, the one and only foundation for immortality of leaders in the world.
					
					 Thanks to respected Marshal Kim Jong Un, President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il will be always alive in the hearts of all people and the history of the great sun will continue forever along with the glorious era of Kim Jong Un, the letter said.

articles.title: Floral Baskets to Kim Jong Un
articles.content:
Floral Baskets to Kim Jong Un
 Pyongyang, October 18 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un received floral baskets from the vice-chairman and a director of the Board of Directors of the Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il Foundation.
					 The baskets were conveyed to an official concerned by Vice-Chairman Keith Bennet and Director Jin Yuhua on Wednesday.

articles.title: Ssirum Contest Held in DPRK
articles.content:
Ssirum Contest Held in DPRK
 Pyongyang, October 18 (KCNA) -- A ssirum (Korean wrestling) contest was held in Pyongyang recently for six days as part of the DPRK Championships.
					 At the contest, young players caught the visitors' eyes with bolt tripping, hoe tripping, belly throw and other skills.
					
					 The Amnokgang Sports Team took the first place in the team event, six body-weight events and above 75kg catch-weight event, thus bagging eight gold medals out of 12.
					
					 Four gold medals went to the Kigwancha Sports Team, the Pyongyang Sports Team, the Waudo Sports Team and the Suyangsan Sports Team.

articles.title: Korean Book, Photo, Craftwork Show Opens in Russia
articles.content:
Korean Book, Photo, Craftwork Show Opens in Russia
 Pyongyang, October 18 (KCNA) -- A Korean book, photo and craftwork exhibition opened at the 19th World Festival of Youth and Students in Sochi of Russia on Oct. 16.
					 Displayed at the front of its venue were photos of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un, who put forward the young people as masters of the youth power.
					
					 There were also their works and photos, books and craftworks introducing the struggle of the Korean youths.
					
					 Present at its opening ceremony were a DPRK delegation of youth and students, the president of the World Federation of Democratic Youth, personages from foreign political parties and bodies and other honorary guests at the festival, delegations of youth and students from tens of different countries and representatives of international bodies.
					
					 The participants presented floral baskets before the photos of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and Kim Jong Un.
					
					 They went round the exhibition after being briefed on the exploits of the great leaders and the Supreme Leader who trained the Korean youths to be successors to the revolution succeeding to the Juche bloodline and brought about a large flower garden of prioritizing the youths and loving them.

articles.title: IT Institute of Kim Chaek University of Technology
articles.content:
IT Institute of Kim Chaek University of Technology
 Pyongyang, October 18 (KCNA) -- The IT Institute of Kim Chaek University of Technology in the DPRK was selected as one of the ten best IT enterprises at the national exhibition of IT successes 2017 held in Pyongyang some days ago.
					 Scientists of the institute have developed many ultra-modern IT products with national significance.
					
					 This year they developed a system for disseminating and protecting software products for six months, thus opening a prospect to introduce it into the whole country. The system helps ensure the unified control and command of circulation of software products in a nationwide scale and reinforce the protection of copyright.
					
					 They also developed programs conducive to realizing the universal 12-year compulsory education. A program enjoys popularity among users as it gives help to studying of students and to teachers. Now it is being introduced into many educational units across the country.
					
					 Besides, they developed valuable educational programs and high-tech and IT products.

articles.title: Monomolecular Water Purifier
articles.content:
Monomolecular Water Purifier
 Pyongyang, October 18 (KCNA) -- Monomolecular water purifier, a high-tech product, is drawing the attention of people in the DPRK. This purifier changes ordinary water into the one for longevity which meets six indexes announced by the World Health Organization.
					 It helps excrete waste matters and all other poisonous matters from all internal organs of human body and have a high metabolism in human body by making water molecules single ones.
					
					 Citizens who have used monomolecular water from Juche 101 (2012) are unanimous in saying that it is good for bolstering up the strength and promoting good health.
					
					 One purifier is put into 10 liters of water and it is used after 20 minutes.
					
					 Candidate Academician, Prof. and Dr. Choe Yong Hwi told KCNA:
					
					 The monomolecular water is the best health drink and an ideal purifier which improves living environment.
					
					 It has proved effective in bettering the quality of products and building parts and elements in the food, chemistry, pharmaceutics, construction, agriculture, gardening and other fields and in raising the productivity and the rate of rooting of crops.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Terms U.S. Chieftain Bringing Nuclear Holocaust to Humankind
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Terms U.S. Chieftain Bringing Nuclear Holocaust to Humankind
 Pyongyang, October 18 (KCNA) -- The U.S. plans to resume nuclear tests as part of its stepped-up moves for nuclear buildup.
					 There is widespread opinion among the conservative hard-liners within the U.S. that nuclear test has to be resumed and old warheads have to be exploded on the basis of random selection under the pretext of "security environment more complicated than the Cold War era". Against this backdrop, the government authorities openly hint at the possibility of nuclear tests, saying the issue of whether to resume the nuclear test or not will be "discussed further."
					
					 Politico, the New York Times and other U.S. media report that the Trump administration can resume nuclear tests to extend the shelf-life of the existing nuclear weapons and to verify the performance of newly developed nuclear warheads.
					
					 The U.S. nuclear test resumption moves have become all the more serious as they were carried out on the extension of Trump's ferocious nuclear confrontation racket calling for "increasing the nuclear capabilities to greater extent until the world can get discretion of the U.S. strength".
					
					 Soon after taking office in the White House, Trump assigned the Defence Department with the task to reexamine and estimate the nuclear force, complaining that the U.S. nuclear force has been left far behind other countries, and has squandered a great amount of funds into its modernization.
					
					 The recent NBC report that Trump called for increasing nuclear weapons ten-fold at a security session in July to the shock of all the audience clearly proves to what extent the U.S. chief executive has reached in his nuclear hysteria.
					
					 The U.S. attempt at the resumption of nuclear test is becoming a reality at Trump's zealous instigation.
					
					 B61-12 tactical nuclear bomb test in Nevada a month ago is just a prelude to it.
					
					 The U.S. has conducted more than 1 000 nuclear tests and has a stockpile of the greatest number of ultra-modern nuclear weapons. Not content with this, it is planning to resume nuclear tests. This is an indication of its sinister hegemonic ambition to dominate the world with an unchallenged nuclear edge.
					
					 It is the U.S. gangster-like logic that all the countries have to be its slaves under its nuclear stick or die.
					
					 The U.S. nuclear tests will naturally lead to nuclear arms race among big powers, disrupt international NPT system and further increase the danger of a nuclear war on the earth.
					
					 Furthermore, the U.S. is the empire of evil which inflicted the nuclear holocaust on humankind for the first time in history. This fact makes the international community closely watch the nuclear criminal state which has strong proclivity to commit the crime again.
					
					 The U.S. chiefly to blame for threatening world peace and security is still holding the DPRK-targeted large-scale nuclear war drills in south Korea and in waters off it, watching for an opportunity to mount a preemptive nuclear strike. It, therefore, does not make any sense for the DPRK to abandon nuclear weapons under this situation.
					
					 The DPRK will continue to bolster the military capability for self-defence and preemptive attack with the nuclear force as a pivot as long as the U.S. and its followers' nuclear threat and blackmail continue, and this will last until all the nuclear weapons are abolished on the earth.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Combating Evils in S. Korea
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Combating Evils in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, October 18 (KCNA) -- There is growing public feeling that the present south Korean authorities should expose the deep-seated evils during the conservative regime and punish those related to the evils, says Rodong Sinmun in an article Wednesday.
					 The article continues:
					
					 The worst of the deep-seated evils in south Korea is now foul actions servile to the U.S. and confrontation with the fellow countrymen in the north. To thoroughly combat them is a way to the realization of independence and democracy in south Korean society.
					
					 The dynamic struggle now under way in south Korea to clean up the deep-seated evils is a just one to wipe out the puppet conservatives, a fetter of the society and the root cause of misfortune and sufferings, and realize justice and democracy.
					
					 Eradicating the deep-seated evils precisely means throwing overboard the conservatives.
					
					 If one fails to destroy the conservatives without mercy, it is impossible to prevent the revival of the Dark Age when fascism and injustice were rampant. This is a serious warning of the reality of south Korea.
					
					 What matters is that the present south Korean authorities are paying lip-service to the combat against the deep-rooted evils and running amuck to repeat the evils of Lee Myung Bak and Park Geun Hye regimes.
					
					 They are following the pro-U.S. policy as the Lee and Park regimes did, reading the faces of the U.S. and the conservatives, and repeating their confrontational moves. This is an act of swimming against the public opinion and it is little short of pricking their own eyes with their own fingers.
					
					 Whoever goes against the public feeling and challenges the desire of the nation are bound to be judged by history. This is the lesson of history taught by the tragedy of traitor Park.

articles.title: Minju Joson Slams S. Korean Warmongers' Confrontation Racket
articles.content:
Minju Joson Slams S. Korean Warmongers' Confrontation Racket
 Pyongyang, October 18 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, puppet Defense Minister of south Korea Song Yong Mu, aboard AWACS, had command communications with units of the ground, naval and air forces to cry out for "strong counteraction" against "possible provocation from the north".
					 The puppet military brass hats, including Jong Kyong Du, chairman of the Joint Chiefs of Staff, showed themselves in military units in the joint security zone of Panmunjom and other frontline areas, crying out for "repulse at a stroke".
					
					 Commenting on the facts, Minju Joson Wednesday brands such confrontation moves as an unpardonable treachery.
					
					 It says:
					
					 The worst situation is prevailing on the Korean peninsula due to the hysterics of old lunatic Trump who continues to let out heinous remarks, resorting to military gambling.
					
					 Against this backdrop, the puppet military gangsters dance to the tune of Trump and kick off hysterics, failing to see into the serious developments and catastrophic consequences entailing therefrom. This is no more than action to fan up the U.S. nuclear war fever.
					
					 We will never remain a passive onlooker to their reckless military confrontation moves pursuant to the U.S policy.
					
					 Such action by the colonial mercenaries and cannon-fodders of the U.S. will result in digging their own grave of their own accord.

articles.title: Minju Joson Fails Trump for His Remarks to Browbeat DPRK
articles.content:
Minju Joson Fails Trump for His Remarks to Browbeat DPRK
 Pyongyang, October 18 (KCNA) -- Old rascal Trump let out a spate of vituperation again with a crafty word-play, stunning the American and international community.
					 At a recent party with U.S. military brass hats, he discussed the issues of the DPRK and Iran, trumpeting about "calm on the eve of a storm" and spelling such rubbish that the past dialogue with the DPRK for decades proved ineffective but "one thing will work". 
					
					 When they asked Trump what was in his mind as they failed to understand, he said "they would come to know soon", sparking off the argument.
					
					 Commenting on the facts, Minju Joson Wednesday says Trump can never stop the advance of the DPRK and browbeat it through his silly behavior.
					
					 For decades, the DPRK has come to see through the U.S. brigandish nature, American-style bluff and wolf-like disposition and realized how to counter its behavior, it notes, adding:
					
					 It is the steadfast faith kept in the mind of the Korean army and people as truth that words do not work on the U.S. and it is needed to fight against the brigandish U.S. imperialists to the last.
					
					 A dog's bark will never make a camel go astray. No matter what the Trump group keeps spouting a flurry of jargons, we will advance like the wind toward the goal of completing the state nuclear force.
					
					 The time will prove what will happen.

articles.title: S. Korea: Reorganization of Ad Hoc Committee for Probe into Truth behind Sunken Ferry Sewol Urged
articles.content:
S. Korea: Reorganization of Ad Hoc Committee for Probe into Truth behind Sunken Ferry Sewol Urged
 Pyongyang, October 18 (KCNA) -- The April 16 Solidarity, a meeting  of bereaved families of victims of the ferry Sewol disaster and civil organizations in south Korea, held a candlelight rally in Seoul on Oct. 14 to urge the authorities to reorganize an ad hoc committee for probe into the truth behind the ferry Sewol disaster.
					 Speakers at the rally underlined the need to probe into the truth behind the ferry disaster to the last, declaring that they would have a large-scale candlelight rally every Saturday.

articles.title: S. Korean Body Urges Probe into Truth about Suppression of Labor Movement
articles.content:
S. Korean Body Urges Probe into Truth about Suppression of Labor Movement
 Pyongyang, October 18 (KCNA) -- According to the south Korean online paper Chamsesang, the south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions made public a statement on Oct. 13 to demand the authorities arrest and punish those involved in the operational politics and the moves for building up public opinion to suppress the labor movement.
					 The statement said that the confederation would gather more information about the practices to bring charges against the Intelligence Service, etc. and to call them to account.

articles.title: Girl Sexual Slave Statue Erected in New York
articles.content:
Girl Sexual Slave Statue Erected in New York
Pyongyang, October 18 (KCNA) -- The "Koreans Association" in New York, an organization of Korean residents in the U.S., got a statue of a girl sexual slave erected in Manhattan, New York, according to a news report.
					 At the unveiling ceremony on Oct. 13, the speakers said that the sexual slavery of Japan should not be forgotten and that such history must not be repeated.
					
					 It is the fourth statue that has been put up in the U.S.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Russia
 Pyongyang, October 18 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us March Forward Dynamically towards Final Victory, Holding Higher the Banner of Songun" was brought out in booklet by the Khabarovsk Territory Publishing House to mark the 20th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and its 72nd birthday.
					 The work, published on April 15, Juche 101 (2012), says that the 100-year history of Kim Il Sung's nation clearly proves the immutable truth that an outstanding leader assures the dignity and prosperity of the country and the nation.
					
					 It sets forth the tasks to be fulfilled to glorify the dignity of Songun Korea for all ages and successfully carry out the cause of building a thriving socialist nation.
					
					 A book releasing ceremony took place at the publishing house on October 6.

articles.title: Statement of SAC Chairman of DPRK Carried by Foreign Media
articles.content:
Statement of SAC Chairman of DPRK Carried by Foreign Media
 Pyongyang, October 18 (KCNA) --The full text of the statement of the chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK was carried by the Nepalese newspaper Arpan and the South African newspaper Laudium Sun and posted on websites of the Nepal Journalist Association for the Study of the Juche Idea and Songun Politics and the Nepal-Korea Friendship Association on October 6.
					 The newspapers and websites carried photos of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The October issue of the Italian magazine La Voce, too, carried the above-said statement.

articles.title: WPK Lauded by Iranian and Russian Media
articles.content:
WPK Lauded by Iranian and Russian Media
 Pyongyang, October 18 (KCNA) -- Iranian and Russian media gave special write-ups to the 20th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and its 72nd birthday.
					 They carried a portrait of smiling Kim Jong Il and photos of the illustrious great men of Mt Paektu.
					
					 The Iranian Ilna reported that the WPK's politics is politics of independence, Songun and benevolence, citing detailed facts to prove it.
					
					 The October issue of the Russian newspaper Serp I Molot said in an article titled "DPRK Marks October 10, 72nd Founding Anniversary of the WPK" that the WPK's 72-year long history is the one in which the party has kept the people's interests above all and steadily improved their living.
					
					 The newspaper Zavtra edited articles under such titles as "Kim Jong Il, His Immortal Party-building Exploits", "Leader Kim Jong Un's Spirit" and "The Invincible WPK" from October 8 to 12.
					
					 The newspaper Komsomolskaya Pravda and Zebri Deve, an online paper of Khabarovsk Territory, carried articles of several titles such as "Kim Jong Un, He Is Chairman of the WPK" and "The DPRK Greets the 72nd Anniversary of the WPK with Nuclear Weapons Taming the U.S." from October 5 to 10.
					
					 The Russia's online magazine Lemchich carried an article titled "Mother Party" on October 9.
					
					 The 69th issue of the newspaper Nizhegorodskaya Pravda devoted one whole page to an article titled "Comrade Kim Jong Un Is the Symbol of the Invincible WPK", which said: The factor of the invincibility of the WPK lies in the guiding idea, steel-like unity and cohesion of the whole party and the people's absolute support and trust.

articles.title: CC de PTC felicita el XIX Congreso del PCCh
articles.content:
CC de PTC felicita el XIX Congreso del PCCh
Pyongyang, 18 de octubre (ACNC) -- El Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea envio el dia 18 un mensaje de felicitacion al XIX Congreso del Partido Comunista de China.
					En su misiva, el CC del PTC felicito calurosamente el XIX Congreso del PCCh y envio cordial saludo a todos los militantes del PCCh y el pueblo chino.
					
					Bajo la correcta direccion del PCCh, el pueblo chino logro en el pasado considerable avance en el cumplimiento de la causa de la construccion del socialismo con peculiaridades chinas, destaco y agrego que el CC del PTC se alegra mucho al respecto.
					
					Y formulo votos sinceros por mayores exitos del XIX Congreso del PCCh.

articles.title: RPDC marchara hasta el final por su camino, declara representante coreano
articles.content:
RPDC marchara hasta el final por su camino, declara representante coreano
Pyongyang, 18 de octubre (ACNC) -- La RPDC se dispuso del arma nuclear y del ICBM como opcion muy justa de autodefensa frente a la real y evidente amenaza nuclear de EE.UU. y en lo adelante tambien, marchara hasta el final sin rodeos por el camino optado por ella en pleno acato a la linea de desarrollo paralelo, eterna bandera de la defensa de paz.
					Asi dijo el representante coreano en su discurso pronunciado durante el debate del tema "Armas nucleares" del primer comite (desarme y seguridad internacional) de la 72a sesion de la Asamblea General de la ONU y continuo:
					
					A pesar del transcurso de mas de 70 anos despues de la fundacion de la ONU, hoy dia tambien, la paz y la seguridad siguen siendo el tema principal de esta organizacion.
					
					Sin embargo, la gente no se acerca, sino se aleja del mundo desnuclearizado.
					
					En la actualidad, se reproduce la carrera armamentista nuclear, que hace recordar el periodo de la Guerra Fria, y en particular, EE.UU. desplego en varias regiones las propiedades estrategicas nucleares para amenazar abiertamente con ellas a los Estados soberanos.
					
					EE.UU. y otros paises portadores de arma nuclear y la OTAN y otros tomaron desde el principio la posicion negativa al tratado de prohibicion del arma nuclear, aprobado en julio pasado en la ONU, y no han participado siquiera en la reunion referente a ese pacto.
					
					La RPDC apoya invariablemente los esfuerzos por la abolicion total de armas nucleares y la desnuclearizacion de todo el mundo, pero no puede ingresar al tratado, ya que EE.UU. lo niega manteniendo en todo tiempo la amenaza y chantaje nucleares sobre la primera.
					
					Ningun pais del mundo habia sufrido durante largo tiempo la amenaza nuclear tan extremada de EE.UU. como la RPDC ni presenciado en sus narices los ejercicios de guerra nuclear mas brutales y barbaros.

articles.title: Tiene lugar 3a reunion ampliada del Consejo de Fundacion Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Tiene lugar 3a reunion ampliada del Consejo de Fundacion Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, 18 de octubre (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar hoy en esta capital la tercera reunion ampliada del Consejo de la Fundacion Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il.
					Asistieron a la ocasion el vicepresidente Keith Bennet y otros miembros del Consejo, los miembros de la Fundacion, la delegacion del Comite Ruso en Homenaje a los Grandes Hombres del monte Paektu y otros huespedes extranjeros y los compatriotas residentes en ultramar. 
					
					Estuvieron presentes en calidad de observador los funcionarios del Secretariado del Consejo. 
					
					La reunion discutio el tema de organizacion del Consejo e hizo balance de sus labores realizadas en un ano despues de la segunda reunion. 
					
					Luego, fue aprobado el enmendado estatuto de la Fundacion Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il y se informo el rumbo de actividades posteriores del Consejo de la Fundacion. 
					
					Quedo adoptada una carta enviada al Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Inaugurada exposicion coreana en Sochi
articles.content:
Inaugurada exposicion coreana en Sochi 
Pyongyang, 18 de octubre (ACNC) -- Quedo inaugurada la exposicion de libros, fotos, bordados y artesanias coreanos en el XIX Festival Mundial de la Juventud y los Estudiantes que se efectua en Sochi, Rusia.
					En la pared frontal de su sede se exhibian las fotos del Presidente Kim Il Sung, el Dirigente Kim Jong Il y el Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un quienes presentaron a los jovenes como protagonistas de la potencia juvenil.
					
					Estaban expuestos ademas las obras de los grandes hombres sin iguales y las fotos, los libros, los bordados y piezas artesanales que demuestran las actividades de los jovenes coreanos.
					
					En la ceremonia inaugural efectuada el dia 16, tomaron parte la delegacion de jovenes y estudiantes coreanos, el presidente de la Federacion Mundial de la Juventud Democratica, las personalidades de los partidos politicos y entidades de varios paises, los huespedes honorarios del festival, las delegaciones de jovenes y estudiantes provenientes de decenas de paises y los representantes de organizaciones internacionales.
					
					Los participantes depositaron los cestos de flores ante las fotos de los lideres coreanos.
					
					Pasaron revista a la sede de exposicion luego de escuchar las explicaciones sobre las proezas de los lideres antecesores y del Maximo Dirigente quienes formaron a los jovenes coreanos como fidedignos sucesores del linaje del Juche estableciendo el ambiente social de apreciarlos y amarlos.
